title: Wheel falls off plane during take-off forcing pilot into an emergency landing in Kenya
text:
A plane was forced to make an emergency landing after the wheel fell off during take-off.

The Silverstone Air plane took off from Lodwar Airport in the northwest of Kenya and was heading for the capital Nairobi this morning.

However the captain made an emergency landing after the plane was missing a wheel at Kenya's Eldoret International Airport - 238 miles from where it took off.

'This was a precautionary action, and the aircraft landed safely,' the airline said in a statement,' the captain said in statement.

The Silverstone Air plane after making its emergency landing at Kenya's Eldoret International Airport with a wheel missing

A ground worker carries the wheel in after it fell off during take off at Lodwar Airport in the northwest of Kenya (left). The captain was forced to make an emergency landing as a 'precautionary' measure after the wheel (pictured right and left) fell off

The passengers were booked onto another flight to the capital.

A spokeswoman for the airline declined to comment on the number of passengers on board, according to CNN, and said the airline was investigating.

Earlier this month another Silverstone aircraft carrying 55 people skidded off the runway in Nairobi into trees, leaving some of its passengers injured, according to officials.

Many people have expressed concerns about the aircraft claiming the the regulatory body had neglected its duty of safety.

Gilbert Kibe, director-general of the Kenya Civil Aviation Authority, said in a statement: 'KCAA reassures the public that safety and security remain within the Kenyan airspace remains a paramount priority, and we encourage you to remain vigilant in reporting safety concerns.'



People have expressed their concern over Kenyan Silverstone Air after aircraft carrying 55 people skidded off the runway in Nairobi into trees earlier this month (file image)
description: A Silverstone Air plane took off from Lodwar Airport in the northwest of Kenya this morning. However it was forced to do an emergency landing after the wheel fell off during take off.
